General.Name: Bali Towerindo Sentra Tbk
General.Description: PT Bali Towerindo Sentra Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in tower and telecommunication infrastructure business in Indonesia. The company operates and leases tower buildings or telecommunications towers, and telecommunications facilities; and provides tower facilities equipped with integrated transmission facilities through fiber optic and wireless transmission network. It also offers information and communication technology, and pay television broadcasting and management services; and leases BTS tower. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bali, Indonesia. PT Bali Towerindo Sentra Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kharisma Cipta Towerindo.
